archimate:Assessment.name: Aligning the assessment approach with service needs in line with biggest risk and threat areas would be valuable
archimate:Assessment.documentation: An assessment that provides mitigation recommendations to the biggest risks/threat a service faces is valuable and more tailored to each service's needs. This could be reached by deciding on our most common service types (E.g. "Cloud platform service"), and looking at applicaple controls and assessments questions per each of those.
